data.title: Weather in Vagay, Tyumen Oblast, Russia
data.meta_description: The most accurate current weather forecast in Vagay. Be prepared for today's weather with a detailed local report.
data.text:
Weather details for Vagay, on Tuesday, August 13th:

The maximum temperature during the day will be 18°C at about 2 pm. The day will have very high relative humidity, with average humidity of 88%, ranging from 72% to a maximum value of 99% at about 10 pm. The wind will be breezy, and will get up to 26 km/h at 3 pm, blowing from the south-east. The cloud coverage will range from 74% around 7 pm to as high as 100% around 5 pm with an average of 97%.

The precipitation probability will change throughout the day between 0% and 60%. The highest chance for precipitation will be around 3 pm and the lowest probability around midnight. The dew point will range from 9°C up to a maximum value of 17°C around 6 pm.

The visibility is expected to be good with average visibility of 11 km throughout the day. Atmospheric pressure will be very low with average pressure of 1001 hPa. Sunrise will be at 4:50 am, and sunset at 8:07 pm. The day will have 15 hours and 17 minutes of daylight.

Air quality forecast for Vagay, on Tuesday, August 13th:

On average, the air quality on this day will be good, meaning that air quality is satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk. According to our index, ranging from 0 to 500, the air quality is going to be between values of 25 and 52.

Pollen forecast for Vagay, on Tuesday, August 13th:

Tree pollen on this day is expected to have very high risk. There's no risk of weed pollen, and as for grass pollen, this day is expected to have very low risk.

Weather details for Vagay, on Wednesday, August 14th:

The highest temperature of the day will be 20°C at about 2 pm. The day will have very high relative humidity, with average humidity of 93%, ranging from 75% to a maximum value of 100% at about 5 am. The wind will be light, and will get up to 15 km/h at 5 pm, blowing from the south. The cloud coverage will range from 40% around 3 pm to as high as 100% around 5 pm with an average of 89%.

The precipitation probability will change throughout the day between 0% and 40%. The highest chance for precipitation will be around 3 pm and the lowest probability around midnight. The dew point will range from 13°C up to a maximum value of 16°C around noon.

The visibility is expected to be good with average visibility of 10 km throughout the day. Atmospheric pressure will be extremely low with average pressure of 996 hPa. Sunrise will be at 4:52 am, and sunset at 8:05 pm, making it a total of 15 hours and 13 minutes of daylight.

Air quality forecast for Vagay, on Wednesday, August 14th:

On average, the air quality on this day will be good, meaning that air quality is satisfactory, and air pollution poses little or no risk. According to our index, ranging from 0 to 500, the air quality is going to be between values of 22 and 31.

Pollen forecast for Vagay, on Wednesday, August 14th:

The overall pollen forecast for this day shows no significant pollen. Tree pollen on this day is expected to have very low risk. There's no risk of weed pollen, and as for grass pollen, this day is expected to have no risk.
